Use a reputed media player that can play H.265 (HEVC : High Efficiency Video Coding) videos has proper ASS subtitle support. 
MPC-HC, MPC-BE, MPV... are recommended :]  
http://mpc-hc.org  
http://mpcbe.sourceforge.net 
VLC and players like latest GOM, KMP with LAV can play HEVC, but MPC-HC, MPC-BE, MPV... with madVR gives better quality :) 
Linux, Mac, Chrome : MPV.io | libde265.org 
In Mobile, Android, Tabs, use a media player like MX Player, VLC Player... that can play H.265. 
 
H.265 is the Next Generation Codec... Some software media players that are not up-to date may not play HEVC video! 
Most hardware players, TVs are unable to play HEVC.... But some newest TVs support HEVC (+ 4K video) and will become mainstream in near future!.. :] 
Wait for the future.. :)  
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/High_Efficiency_Video_Coding (HEVC / H.265 Video)  
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/SubStation_Alpha (ASS/SSA Sub Format)

Plot Summary 
The 2nd season of Jojo's Bizarre Adventure: Stardust Crusaders. 
After 30 gruelling days of fighting off wave after wave of assassins sent by the megalomaniacal vampire DIO 
(all the while travelling by plane, train, and automobile from Japan, through South-East Asia, and across the Middle East), 
Jotaro and his allies have made it at last to Egypt where DIO lies in wait. DIO, striving to end the Joestar line 
that has stood in his way for 100 years, sends his final and most fervent team of Stand-user followers, the 9 Egyptian Gods, 
to eliminate Jotaro and his allies. Jotaro and his party now have only two weeks to make their way to DIOâ€™s hideout 
in Cairo and eliminate him before Jotaroâ€™s mother succumbs to DIOâ€™s curse... 


Vintage: 2015-01-10 to 2015-06-20
